physDesc.p: Fragments 1-17 (in mm), (1) 16 x 30, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 16 x 27, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 46 x 48, (A) 5 lines, right margin, (B) 5 lines, left margin, (4) 40 x 33, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, right margin, (5) 45 x 67, (A) 2 lines, left bottom margins, (B) blank, (6) 41 x 37, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 39 x 17, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (8) 30 x 46, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (9) 41 x 21, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 43 x 16, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 29 x 17, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 45 x 17, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 105 x 30, (A) 13 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (14) 88 x 33, (A) 6 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (15) 91 x 42, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (16) 90 x 44, (A) 8 lines, bottom margin, (B) 12 lines, bottom margin, (17) 86 X 57, (A) 2 col.
